Affiliate License-Licensee.policy_text: This clause must be reviewed to ensure compliance with company licensing standards and applicable law.

Affiliate License-Licensor.policy_text: This clause must be reviewed to ensure licensors do not exceed granted rights or conflict with existing agreements.

Agreement Date.policy_text: Agreement dates must be clear and enforceable as the start of contractual obligations.

Anti-Assignment.policy_text: This clause must be reviewed to ensure assignment restrictions align with company transfer policies.

Audit Rights.policy_text: This clause must be reviewed to ensure audit rights are reasonable and proportionate.

Cap On Liability.policy_text: This clause must be reviewed to ensure liability caps comply with company standards.

Change Of Control.policy_text: This clause must be reviewed to ensure change-of-control provisions are acceptable.

Competitive Restriction Exception.policy_text: This clause must be reviewed to ensure competition restrictions allow for required exceptions.

Covenant Not To Sue.policy_text: This clause must be reviewed to ensure covenants not to sue are enforceable and limited.

Document Name.policy_text: Document names must be clear and consistent with company templates.

Effective Date.policy_text: Effective date must be clearly defined and enforceable.

Exclusivity.policy_text: Exclusivity clauses must be reviewed to avoid excessive restrictions on company operations.

Expiration Date.policy_text: Expiration dates must be clearly specified to avoid ambiguity.

Governing Law.policy_text: Governing law must align with company jurisdictional preferences.

Insurance.policy_text: Insurance obligations must comply with company risk management policies.

Ip Ownership Assignment.policy_text: IP ownership clauses must ensure company retains rights to developed intellectual property.

Irrevocable Or Perpetual License.policy_text: Irrevocable or perpetual licenses must be carefully reviewed for business risk.

Joint Ip Ownership.policy_text: Joint IP ownership must be clearly defined to avoid disputes.

License Grant.policy_text: License grants must be scoped to avoid unintended rights transfers.

Liquidated Damages.policy_text: Liquidated damages must be reasonable and legally enforceable.

Minimum Commitment.policy_text: Minimum commitments must align with business expectations and capacity.

Most Favored Nation.policy_text: Most Favored Nation clauses must be reviewed to avoid commercial risk.

No-Solicit Of Customers.policy_text: No-solicit of customers clauses must be reasonable and enforceable.

No-Solicit Of Employees.policy_text: No-solicit of employees clauses must comply with employment law.

Non-Compete.policy_text: Non-compete clauses must be limited in scope and duration.

Non-Disparagement.policy_text: Non-disparagement clauses must not restrict lawful speech.

Non-Transferable License.policy_text: Non-transferable licenses must align with company licensing policies.

Notice Period To Terminate Renewal.policy_text: Notice periods for renewal termination must provide adequate lead time.

Post-Termination Services.policy_text: Post-termination service obligations must be clearly defined.

Price Restrictions.policy_text: Price restrictions must comply with antitrust and commercial laws.

Renewal Term.policy_text: Renewal terms must be reasonable and clearly stated.

Revenue/Profit Sharing.policy_text: Revenue/profit sharing must be clearly calculated and transparent.

Rofr/Rofo/Rofn.policy_text: Right of first refusal/offer/negotiation clauses must be carefully reviewed for business impact.

Source Code Escrow.policy_text: Source code escrow clauses must protect company access rights if vendor fails.

Termination For Convenience.policy_text: Termination for convenience must require adequate notice and avoid imbalance.

Third Party Beneficiary.policy_text: Third-party beneficiary rights must be clearly limited.

Uncapped Liability.policy_text: Uncapped liability must be avoided unless explicitly approved.

Unlimited/All-You-Can-Eat-License.policy_text: Unlimited license grants must be reviewed for potential revenue leakage.

Volume Restriction.policy_text: Volume restrictions must align with expected business usage.

Warranty Duration.policy_text: Warranty duration should comply with statutory minimums and industry standards.

Parties.policy_text: All contracting parties must be identified with consistent legal entity names as registered in the Secretary of State records.
